statements: DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 100 AND rating > 3;
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE username LIKE 'John%' AND rating < 2;
DELETE FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 123 AND rating > 7;
DELETE FROM game_features WHERE impact_score < 50 OR feature_name = 'Multiplayer Mode';

DELETE FROM game_reviews WHERE game_id = 100 AND review_id = 5;
DELETE FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%negative%' LIMIT 1;
DELETE FROM Review WHERE rating < 3 AND timestamp < '2021-01-01';
